Air Apprentice.name: Air Apprentice
Air Apprentice.description: You're getting good at that air thing. You've made 10 air matches!

Fire Apprentice.name: Fire Apprentice
Fire Apprentice.description: You're getting good at that fire thing. You've made 10 fire matches!

Water Apprentice.name: Water Apprentice
Water Apprentice.description: You're getting good at that water thing. You've made 10 water matches!

Earth Apprentice.name: Earth Apprentice
Earth Apprentice.description: You're getting good at that earth thing. You've made 10 earth matches!

Void Apprentice.name: Void Apprentice
Void Apprentice.description: Should you be dabbling in that type of magic? You've made 10 void matches!

Air Novice.name: Air Novice
Air Novice.description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with air.

Fire Novice.name: Fire Novice
Fire Novice.description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with fire.

Water Novice.name: Water Novice
Water Novice.description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with water.

Earth Novice.name: Earth Novice
Earth Novice.description: Congratulations! You've gained novice proficiency with earth.

Void Novice.name: Void Novice
Void Novice.description: Dark magic isn't for novices, so be careful!

Air Journeyman.name: Air Journeyman
Air Journeyman.description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of air.

Fire Journeyman.name: Fire Journeyman
Fire Journeyman.description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of fire.

Earth Journeyman.name: Earth Journeyman
Earth Journeyman.description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of earth.

Void Journeyman.name: Void Journeyman
Void Journeyman.description: Avoid the Void! You don't want to keep going down this path.

Air Master.name: Air Master
Air Master.description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of air.

Water Journeyman.name: Water Journeyman
Water Journeyman.description: You've made it pretty far down the journey on the path of water.

Fire Master.name: Fire Master
Fire Master.description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of fire.

Earth Master.name: Earth Master
Earth Master.description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of earth.

Water Master.name: Water Master
Water Master.description: Masters of the Universe? Nope, just of water.

Void Master.name: Void Master
Void Master.description: You're now a master of the dark arts. Stupifexpelierminous!

Air Savant.name: Air Savant
Air Savant.description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Air.

Fire Savant.name: Fire Savant
Fire Savant.description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Fire.

Water Savant.name: Water Savant
Water Savant.description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Water.

Earth Savant.name: Earth Savant
Earth Savant.description: Savant, now that's a nifty word, and you totally deserve it in all matters regarding Earth.

Void Savant.name: Void Savant
Void Savant.description: Wow. You might have to uninstall before your darkness eats your computer.

Hegemon.name: Hegemon
Hegemon.description: You've just crossed beyond the Threshold of greatness by beating 20 levels!

Rune Master.name: Rune Master
Rune Master.description: So many runes, so little time. You've truly mastered the the manipulation of runes.

Rune Savant.name: Rune Savant
Rune Savant.description: You're such a savant that there are no more words to describe your awesomeness.

Big Bada Boom.name: Big Bada Boom
Big Bada Boom.description: Your explosions are so big that they can probably be seen from space.

Easy Peasy.name: Easy Peasy
Easy Peasy.description: That wasn't so bad, was it? Good job defending the towers.

Middle Man.name: Middle Man
Middle Man.description: Excellent work defending the towers. Here's a lousy award for it.

Master of the Tower.name: Master of the Tower
Master of the Tower.description: We bow to you, the Master of the Tower.

The L Award.name: The L Award
The L Award.description: It's okay that you lost. It's not like the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.

Frobs It All.name: Frobs It All
Frobs It All.description: This losing thing, it's getting to be a habit!

The Frobinator.name: The Frobinator
The Frobinator.description: If you can't say something nice, say nothing at all. (You lost again.)

QQ.name: QQ
QQ.description: How did you manage to lose to the Tutor? That's impossible!

The Mystical Ruler.name: The Mystical Ruler
The Mystical Ruler.description: Magic permeates the very fiber of your town.

The Republic.name: The Republic
The Republic.description: Power to the people! Well, at least they can vote on it.

The General.name: The General
The General.description: This is madness! No, this is ReignMaker!

Animal Planet.name: Animal Planet
Animal Planet.description: Peace and love to all who live in your town. Oh, and a few human sacrifices.

Journeyman Healer.name: Journeyman Healer
Journeyman Healer.description: Who knew towers needed so much healing?

Master Healer.name: Master Healer
Master Healer.description: If anyone needs a tower healed, they should come to you, the Master Healer.

Apprentice Blacksmith.name: Apprentice Blacksmith
Apprentice Blacksmith.description: Congratulations! You learned how to make something.

Journeyman Blacksmith.name: Journeyman Blacksmith
Journeyman Blacksmith.description: Congratulations! You learned to make a few things.

Expert Blacksmith.name: Expert Blacksmith
Expert Blacksmith.description: Wow, you sure do know how to make a lot of things!

Master Blacksmith.name: Master Blacksmith
Master Blacksmith.description: You are a master of metal, indeed. You know all the blacksmithing recipes.

Apprentice Builder.name: Apprentice Builder
Apprentice Builder.description: This is the house that you built.

Journeyman Builder.name: Journeyman Builder
Journeyman Builder.description: Things are starting to look nice around here.

Expert Builder.name: Expert Builder
Expert Builder.description: This is getting to be a rather splendid place.

Master Builder.name: Master Builder
Master Builder.description: Your city is looking mighty snazzy!

Tinker.name: Tinker
Tinker.description: You've definitely perked that smithy up.

Master Crafter.name: Master Crafter
Master Crafter.description: No finer place to craft has ever been built.

Dog Catcher.name: Dog Catcher
Dog Catcher.description: Discovered your first bestiary card. Gotta get them all!

Zookeeper.name: Zookeeper
Zookeeper.description: You're starting a rather nice collection there.

Gotta Catch Them All.name: Gotta Catch Them All
Gotta Catch Them All.description: I choose you and your little dog, too! You've collected 40 bestiary scrolls.

Ding!.name: Ding!
Ding!.description: You unlocked your first (and now your second) achievement.

Ding, Grats!.name: Ding, Grats!
Ding, Grats!.description: You've achieved 10 achievements. What an achievement!

Gifted.name: Gifted
Gifted.description: You've achieved 25 achievements. What an achievement!

Very Gifted.name: Very Gifted
Very Gifted.description: You've achieved 50 achievements. What an achievement!

Achiever.name: Achiever
Achiever.description: You've achieved 100 achievements. What an achievement!

Heals, Please!.name: Heals, Please!
Heals, Please!.description: You hired a healer from your people.

Healers, Healers Everywhere.name: Healers, Healers Everywhere
Healers, Healers Everywhere.description: You hired some healers to keep things healthy.

Heal Me, We Win!.name: Heal Me, We Win!
Heal Me, We Win!.description: Heals for everyone! You've hired a high priest.

Drood.name: Drood
Drood.description: Hired a druid from your citizens

Droods.name: Droods
Droods.description: Holy fluffy bunnies - you got yourself a lot of druids.

Many Droods.name: Many Droods
Many Droods.description: Back to nature! You hired an archdruid.

Stone Roller.name: Stone Roller
Stone Roller.description: You got yourself a stoner, man.

Rock and Hard Place.name: Rock and Hard Place
Rock and Hard Place.description: You hired a bunch of stoners, and the rocks rained down.

Shoot 'Em Up.name: Shoot 'Em Up
Shoot 'Em Up.description: You hired some archers, and they're very into pin cushions.

Pew! Pew!.name: Pew! Pew!
Pew! Pew!.description: You hired not just any archer, but an elite archer!

Peek-a-boo.name: Peek-a-boo
Peek-a-boo.description: Hired a scout from your citizens.

Hide and Seek.name: Hide and Seek
Hide and Seek.description: Hired a bunch of scouts from your citizens and sent them to the battlefield.

Search and Destroy.name: Search and Destroy
Search and Destroy.description: Hired a lead scout from your citizens, and watch him scurry around the field.

Whole Lot of Nothing.name: Whole Lot of Nothing
Whole Lot of Nothing.description: Corrupted, schmorrupted. You'll break any runes you can find.

Ice Breaker.name: Ice Breaker
Ice Breaker.description: Nothing stays frozen around you, you ice breaker!

Thrifty.name: Thrifty
Thrifty.description: Save those triads for a rainy day. You'll need them.

Triad Pincher.name: Triad Pincher
Triad Pincher.description: A triad saved is a triad earned.

Miser.name: Miser
Miser.description: You need to go swim in your triads today.

Little Spender.name: Little Spender
Little Spender.description: You finally have some buying power. You've spent 5000 triads.

Middle Spender.name: Middle Spender
Middle Spender.description: Buy, baby, buy! You've spnt 50,000 triads.

Big Spenda'.name: Big Spenda'
Big Spenda'.description: It's only money, right? You've spent 100,000 triads.

Gold Digger.name: Gold Digger
Gold Digger.description: Digging up triads is your forte. You have collected 1000 triad runes on your board.

Team Medic.name: Team Medic
Team Medic.description: You don't need anyone else to heal you. You have used 1000 health runes.

Mind Reader.name: Mind Reader
Mind Reader.description: Let's just take a peek at those thoughts.

Master Psion.name: Master Psion
Master Psion.description: Your citizens know you spy on them with care.

Apprentice Becomes the Master.name: Apprentice Becomes the Master
Apprentice Becomes the Master.description: You beat the Tutor in the tutorial. Congratulations!

Void the Defeat.name: Void the Defeat
Void the Defeat.description: You defeated the Obliterator, a servant of the Void. Congratulations!

Not in Kansas Anymore.name: Not in Kansas Anymore
Not in Kansas Anymore.description: You beat the Wizard whose face is strangely familiar. Congratulations!

Flung The Flinger.name: Flung The Flinger
Flung The Flinger.description: You beat the Elemental Lord, something the Alchemists claimed they did. Congratulations!

Got My Eye on You.name: Got My Eye on You
Got My Eye on You.description: You beat that rolling eyeball known as the Glaring Glancer. Congratulations!

Heal OP.name: Heal OP
Heal OP.description: You beat General Mabelrode and saved the world. Congratulations!

Turtoom Mastery.name: Turtoom Mastery
Turtoom Mastery.description: You did a good thing in destroying these poor, corrupted creatures.

Turtoom Boom Boom.name: Turtoom Boom Boom
Turtoom Boom Boom.description: We shall mourn these good turtooms.

D'orc Mastery.name: D'orc Mastery
D'orc Mastery.description: Good job in destroying the d'orcs!

Gobbo Mastery.name: Gobbo Mastery
Gobbo Mastery.description: The gobbo horde has been contained.

Strange Creatures Mastery.name: Strange Creatures Mastery
Strange Creatures Mastery.description: Strange creatures? Cute but no cigar!

Gargantupine Mastery.name: Gargantupine Mastery
Gargantupine Mastery.description: The gargantupine threat has been contained.

Void Mastery.name: Void Mastery
Void Mastery.description: Avoid the Void. That's definitely a new saying.

Dragonet Mastery.name: Dragonet Mastery
Dragonet Mastery.description: Excellent work in dispersing the crazed dragonets.

Romel Mastery.name: Romel Mastery
Romel Mastery.description: Horrid creatures! All romels need to be destroyed.

Evil Slemor Mastery.name: Evil Slemor Mastery
Evil Slemor Mastery.description: What kind of horrible beings would corrupt slemors?

Undead Mastery.name: Undead Mastery
Undead Mastery.description: Who doesn't like fighting the undead?

Glancer Mastery.name: Glancer Mastery
Glancer Mastery.description: Fighting eyeballs? At first you were the pupil, but now you are the master.

Gold That Glitters.name: Gold That Glitters
Gold That Glitters.description: Gold flags for every tower? Maybe YOU should be the king!
